description: Description says guitar also but it's really only for piano.
summary: Misleading description (not for guitar as stated)

description: Shows alot of ads by google, laggy given that it runs through the internet.

As others here have stated - FULL OF ADVERTISEMENTS - despite me using an Ad-Blocker.

Adverts can be 'killed' with the 'X' in the corner - but then a Google placeholder pops up! 
I do NOT wish to have Google invading my computers.

Insists on placing cookies on my PC without giving a choice or explaining what they do.

Cookies are placed outside the use of a web browser so my cookie control add-ons cannot be used. 

Asks you to 'Log In' or 'Create and Account' , Oh yes?? How much of MY information are you going to scrape and keep.

This looks a complex application - so why is it COMPLETELY coded so that one has to connect to their own servers - WITHOUT USING A BROWSER!!

I am DEEPLY suspicious of this software. There is a sinister reason it has been coded in this way.

AVOID. AVOID. AVOID. AVOID.
summary: ADVERTS. ADVERTS. ADVERTS. INSISTS ON USING COOKIES!

description: El paquete no existe en ubuntu
